about_the_game:
"Pathfinder RPG - GameMastery Map Pack: Shops


Open for Adventure!
Bargain hunters beware, dragon-sized discounts are ready to rampage through your campaign! As much as adventurers enjoy delving through dungeons and slaying monsters, there's something else treasure-hunters love: shopping for new gear. Whether your heroes are preparing for their next adventure or are back from the dungeon with backpacks bursting with loot, no Game Master wants to spend time drawing every tavern stool or store shelf. Fortunately, with Paizo Publishing's latest GameMastery Map Pack, you don't have to!
This line of gaming accessories provides simple and elegant tools for the busy Game Master. Inside, you'll find 18 captivating 5 x 8 specially coated map tiles, allowing you to use wet-erase and dry-erase markers, then remove ink with ease!
The tiles herein can be combined into a variety of any town's most adventurer-friendly shops and establishments or reveal the interior of locales appearing on 
GameMastery Flip-Mat: City Streets[/url] , including:
  • Armorsmith
  • Weapon Dealer
  • Curiosity Shoppe
  • Scriptorium Bookseller
  • General Store
  • Local Tavern
Game Masters shouldn't waste their time sketching maps every time their players need to pick up supplies. With GameMastery Map Pack: Shops, you'll always be ready whether your players head to market hunting for bargains or adventure!

NOTE: This product has been made specifically for the Pathfinder ruleset, but can be used for 5E, Starfinder, or any ruleset supported by Fantasy Grounds

This product is not a PDF or accessible outside of Fantasy Grounds. It has been lovingly converted for use within Fantasy Grounds and Features the Following additions:
  • All maps resized and set up with a preset grid to make combats easy to manage
  • Individual area descriptions linked to maps, containing new encounters, treasure parcels and descriptions for just that area
  • Tokens for each encounter are pre-placed in starting locations on the map. You can edit these on the fly
  • Drag and drop treasure parcels and Encounter XP that is easily awarded to your players to keep the game moving ahead
  • All the images and handouts from the book available to share with your players as you need them
"
